New Records: India posted their highest T20I score in Sri Lanka of 213/7.
Key Match Events: India beat Sri Lanka by 43 runs.
Suryakumar Yadav scored a breathtaking 58 off 26 balls.
Riyan Parag picked three wickets for 5 runs in 1.2 overs.
Matheesha Pathirana was the pick of the bowlers for Sri Lanka with figures of 4/40.
Pathum Nissanka top-scored for Sri Lanka with 79 off 48 balls.
Arshdeep Singh took 2 wickets for 24 runs in 3 overs.
Axar Patel took 2 wickets for 38 runs.
Sri Lanka were bundled out for 170 in 19.2 overs.
